text: wazidnahum ealaa ma dhukr min alnaeim fawakih wlhwmana mimaa ysttab wyushtha, wamin hdha alnaeim 'anahum yteatawn fi aljanat kasana min alkhmr, ynawl 'ahaduhum sahbh; liatima bdhlk srwrhm, whdha alsharab mkhalf lkhmr aldnya, fala yzwl bih eaql sahbh, wala yahsul bsbbh lghw, wala kalam fih 'iithm 'aw mesyt
